func.title: ScheduleCall

param.name: obj
param.desc: Object in which to call the function. nil for no object context.

param.name: function
param.desc: Name of the function to call.

param.name: delay
param.desc: Delay after which the first call is made. If repeat is greather than 1, this is also the delay inbetween subsequent calls.

param.name: repeat
param.desc: Number of calls. If 0 or not specified, the call is made exactly once.
Additional parameters which are passed to the function called.

func.desc: Calls a function after a specified delay.
func.remark: This function is implemented in System.ocg using the effect "IntScheduleCall" in function Call.

example.text: Calls the function "Explode" in this object with a delay of 500 ticks and passes 50 as additional parameter. This will cause the object to explode with a strength of 50 after 500 frames unless the call is cancelled earlier using ClearScheduleCall.
